## Color.rotate() method

Rotates the hue by the specified degrees.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rotate(degrees: number): Color;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Degrees to rotate (can be any number)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Color](./chromaterm.color.md)

A new Color instance with the transformation applied
